channel.title: Comments for page "The Dark Hour"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Dark Hour"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I completely ignored the possibility that Dark Band loops. I got it last season, so that would explain why I'm not getting the mission. Thanks for the advice everyone, and thanks for pointing out the obvious thing I overlooked, Buretsu.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Dark Band loops, so if you already got in in a previous season, you don't need to get it again, and the quest won't show up.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: okay, then try getting all the other allies that you can get with the Awesome Pants. for all we know Vanilla is required for the quest now. let us know what the new requirements are so we can fix this accordingly.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The requirements must have changed. I've double checked all my team members, I have the correct ones at level 2. In fact, I have all the reaper allies at level 2. And I'm in season 4, so that can't be a problem if it's season 2+.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: while the requirements are there, make sure you didn't mistake one of the allies for another one. i've known some people to do that and try getting the other mono allies and see if that works. the requirements could've also been changed which wouldn't surprise me.

item.title: Can't start the quest
item.content:encoded: I've got all the requirements (Awesome pants, and all three level 2 allies) yet I can't start the quest. Anyone know if there's another requirement not listed here?

item.title: P3
item.content:encoded:
Taijutsu
Focus!
You look at your watch - the time is approaching. What happens?
Difficulty: 20 Successes: 20

and

Genjutsu
Defend!
Your classmates, in this moment out of time, draw arcane weapons and attack each other! Survive!
Difficulty: 20 Successes: 20

look like references to the game Persona 3 as a large portion of the game takes place in "The Dark Hour" a period of time when people are completely unaware of everything around them until the hour passes except for those who have a "Persona". The Persona are grouped based of their arcana so they could be considered "arcana weapons"

item.title: corrections
item.content:encoded:
"Your spiritual hard rolls from your shoulders"

Your spiritual head rolls from your shoulders
